Absolute positioning

Table of contents

  • Description
  • Positioning options
  • Positioning examples

Related

Design guide

  • Grids - Design guide
  • Margin proxmity - Design guide

Description

By default, grids cells float left and stack side-by-side, forming rows from left to right. However, you can use positional CSS to layer them on top of each other. The parent cell will act as the container, and the child cells can be layered horizontally and vertically within the container, on top of other cells.

Note

The layer that is to appear behind the absolutely position object must have a CSS property that is anything but static. For example, grids have a CSS property of position: relative, so they work well with this design feature.

Positioning options

The browser will always position content on the top left. To modify the default placement, both the x and y position must be defined. The x positions are pstn-lft-* and pstn-rght-*. The y positions are pstn-tp-* and pstn-bttm-*. Since positions and work together, then the posting is also responsive, so that when the grid system linearizes for smaller viewports, so do the positioning.

Top positioning Right positioning Bottom positioning Left positioning
  • .pstn-tp-xs = always positioned
  • .pstn-tp-sm = tablets upwards only
  • .pstn-tp-md = small desktop upwards only
  • .pstn-tp-lg = large desktop upwards only
  • .pstn-rght-xs = always positioned
  • .pstn-rght-sm = tablets upwards only
  • .pstn-rght-md = small desktop upwards only
  • .pstn-rght-lg = large desktop upwards only
  • .pstn-bttm-xs = always positioned
  • .pstn-bttm-sm = tablets upwards only
  • .pstn-bttm-md = small desktop upwards only
  • .pstn-bttm-lg = large desktop upwards only
  • .pstn-lft-xs = always positioned
  • .pstn-lft-sm = tablets upwards only
  • .pstn-lft-md = small desktop upwards only
  • .pstn-lft-lg = large desktop upwards only

Adjust the margin

Content is always positioned flush with the edges. To add a margin, use the margin proximity classes.

Use when

(Info goes here)

Do not use when

(Info goes here)

Positioning examples

pstn-tp-md pstn-rght-md

125 years of parks

Parks Canada Review

Lost Arctic Ships

Code

<section class="col-md-6">
	<h3><code>pstn-tp-md pstn-rght-md</code></h3>
	<img width="700" height="190" src="position.png" alt="" class="img-responsive" />
	<div class="row">
		<div class="col-md-8 pstn-tp pstn-rght">
			<div class="row">
				<div class="col-md-4 opct-90">
					<a href="#">
						<img width="100" height="50" src="position-mini-3.png" alt="" class="img-responsive" />
						<p class="small well brdr-rds-0 well-sm">125 years of parks</p>
					</a>
				</div>
				<div class="col-md-4 opct-90">
					<a href="#">
						<img width="100" height="50" src="position-mini-2.png" alt="" class="img-responsive" />
						<p class="small well brdr-rds-0 well-sm">Parks Canada Review</p>
					</a>
				</div>
				<div class="col-md-4 opct-90">
					<a href="#">
						<img width="100" height="50" src="position-mini-1.png" alt="" class="img-responsive" />
						<p class="small well brdr-rds-0 well-sm">Lost Arctic Ships</p>
					</a>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</section>

pstn-bttm-md pstn-lft-md + alert with mrgn-bttm-0

Note

I love camping!

Code 
<section class="col-md-6">
	<h3><code>pstn-bttm-md pstn-lft-md</code + alert with <code>mrgn-bttm-0</code>></h3>
	<img width="700" height="190" src="position.png" alt="" class="img-responsive" />
	<div class="row">
		<div class="pstn-bttm-md pstn-lft-md">
			<div class="col-md-12">
				<section class="opct-80 alert alert-info brdr-rds-0 mrgn-bttm-0">
					<h4>Note</h4>
					<p><strong>I love camping!</strong></p>
				</section>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</section>

				</section>

		</div>
	</div>

pstn-bttm-md col-md-12 + right-aligned text with mrgn-bttm-0

I love camping!

Code

<section class="col-md-6">
	<h3><code>pstn-bttm-md col-md-12</code> + right-aligned text with <code>mrgn-bttm-0</code></h3>
	<img width="700" height="190" src="position.png" alt="" class="img-responsive" />
	<div class="row">
		<div class="pstn-bttm-md col-md-12">
			<p class="text-right opct-80 well brdr-rds-0 well-sm mrgn-bttm-0"><strong>I love camping!</strong></p>
		</div>
	</div>
</section>
